title: LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image

replies.body: Definitely make sure your OS is up to date so it has necessary products to proceed with the install.  This issue in most cases have been a combination of permissions settings and really old game files failing to update in the process.  If those steps haven't been working for you, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead.  Attach the logs provided by the HRT to your ticket and our tech guys will check this out for you, and work towards getting you updated.  Hang tight!

Thank you very much for responding. I did in fact update my OS and found no change in the error so I will be going to the support ticket option...I hope there is a resolution to this error soon as more people get it :)
